column4: on my machine, here's what processes are running and how much they are using: Bonobo Activation Server - 1.1MB, Evolution is using a combined 9MB, gcondf2 is using 3MB and fast-user-switch-applet is using 6MB, gksu is using 7MB, gnome is using 20MB, gvfsd is using 7MB, metacity is using 6MB, multiload applet is using 4MB, nautilus is using 24MB, pidgin is using 55MB, python is using 15MB, seahorse is using 18MB, and x is using 2MB
adds up doesn't it?  try vista
Bucky, all the rest are system processes and use between 500 and 900 kilobytes
I've used Vista.  It required well over 2GB of RAM just for the OS itself
